Please do not hesitate to contact us in case of any question.

Inscription fees

We have chosen to create a financially accessible school so that all children, regardless of their parents' income, can benefit from the education and supportive environment that we offer.
The prices are calculated on the basis of a price list which takes into account several parameters of your tax return (e.g. net income, savings, number of children, etc.).
For more information, please click here..

In order to determine the cost of tuition fees for your child, you will find an online form below and you will need your tax form in order to complete it.

Schooling costs simulator

Please contact us if you have any questions.

Registration request

Registration requests for the year 2021-2022 are still open.

Your registration request will be considered as a pre-registration.
After receiving your pre-registration, we will contact you to clarify certain points relating to the school and to give us both the opportunity to get to know each other better. Any pre-registration will be followed by an interview with the school administration.
Click on the button below to open the pre-registration form.

Registration Request
